item.title: Anxious Tale
item.description: This interactive narrative was created in response to the prompt "elicit an emotion." I chose to explore the sensation of social anxiety. I also wanted to challenge myself to see if I could create a sense of unease and discomfort through simple ASCII art-like illustrations. >> Experience the story
